Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- Seat C, Town of Grand Isle
Council Member -- Seat D, Town of Grand Isle
Council Member -- Seat E, Town of Grand Isle

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO LEVY AND COLLECT NOT EXCEEDING 6-1/2 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR 10 YEARS, BEGINNING IN 2008 IN THE PARISH OF JEFFERSON, STATE OF LOUISIANA FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, PROVIDING, MAINTAINING OR OPERATING PARISH PUBLIC LIBRARY FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN SAID PARISH; THE ESTIMATED AMOUNT REASONABLY EXPECTED TO BE COLLECTED FROM THE LEVY OF THE TAX FOR ONE YEAR IS $16,900,000.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana be authorized to levy and collect a tax not to exceed six and one-half (6-1/2) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $16,900,000 for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining and operating public library facilities and equipment therefor within and for the Parish?
